en: On Open: Reveal a random other box.
On Open: Reveal all boxes in this row.
On Open: If the Poison Box is revealed, destroy it. If this is adjacent to an open Viral Box, win.
After you open a box, explodes, destroying itself and adjacent boxes.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to reveal a random adjacent box.
On Open: The next time you click an unrevealed box, reveal it..
On Open: If you've opened every adjacent box, win.
On Open: Close a random other opened box.
On Open: If no other boxes are open, lose.
On Open: Transform a random adjacent box into a Flaming Box.
On Click: Spend 6 Gold to win.
On Open: Reveal the top row and the left and rightmost boxes in the bottom row.
On Open: If the Sword is open, win. Otherwise, lose.
On Open: If 15 or more boxes are open, win.
On Open: In 20 seconds, lose. On Click: Goes faster.
On Open: Close all adjacent boxes.
On Open: Transform 2 random boxes into Loser Boxes.
On Open: Lose all your Gold.
On Click: Destroy a random box, then reveal a random box. Usable 5 times.
Whenever you open another box, 1/3 chance to gain 1 Gold.
On Open: After you open 13 boxes, win.
Whenever you open another box, 1/3 chance to close this.
If revealed, is revealed as a random other box. On Open: 1/3 chance to lose.
If you would win and this is open, destroy this instead.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to close a random other open box. Usable 5 times.
On Open: For 3 opens, you can't lose.
On Open: Transform 2 random boxes into Mimic Boxes.
On Open: If no other boxes are open, win.
On Open: Destroy the next box you click.
Whenever you open another box, 1/10 chance to lose.
After you open a box, explodes, destroying all boxes in its row.
On Open: Close the next open non-Tape box you click.
Whenever you open another box, opens a random adjacent box.
On Open: If all boxes in this row are opened, win.
Whenever you open another box, reveal a random adjacent box.
After you open 3 boxes, destroy this and all but the outer rim of boxes.
This and adjacent boxes can't be destroyed.
On Open: If the Wand and Hat Boxes are open, win.
On Open: If 11 or more boxes are destroyed, win.
On Open: Transform a random unrevealed box into a Fairy Box. If 4 Fairy Boxes are open, win.
On Open: If the Cloak and Wand Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Invert winning and losing for the rest of the game.
After you open a box, destroys itself.
On Open: If the Hat and Cloak Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Open the boxes right and left of this.
On Open: If 21 boxes are open, win. If more than 21 are open, lose.
If this box is destroyed while open, win.
On Click: If 10 or more boxes are open Fire Boxes, win.
On Open: If the next box you open is a Lock Box, win.
Maybe a key could open this..?
On Open: Transform a random other box into a Fire Box.
On Open: Transform all other revealed boxes into Loser Boxes.
On Open: Revive 5 random destroyed boxes. (Boxes are revived closed.)
On Open: Reveal all adjacent boxes. After you open a box, explodes, destroying itself and adjacent boxes.
You can only open boxes adjacent to open boxes.
If this box is destroyed while open, lose.
On Open: If the Dragon is revealed, lose. Otherwise, gain 3 Gold.
Whenever you open an adjacent box, gain 1 Gold.
After you open 3 boxes, reveals and becomes a closed copy of a random adjacent box.
On Open: If you won the last run, win.
On Click: Spend 1 Gold to reveal a random box.
After you open a box, transform adjacent open boxes into Viral Boxes.
On Open: Transform 7 random unrevealed boxes into Food Boxes. After you open 7 boxes without eating a Food Box, lose.
On Open: If you have an unused Achievement Point, transform the Empty Box into a Winner Box.
After you open a box, destroy the top box (right to left).
On Open: If this is the third time you've opened this box, win.
On Click: Eat this box, destroying it. Yummy!
On Open: Reveal 10 random boxes. After you open 3 boxes, lose.
On Open: If in the bottom row, win. Otherwise, transform a random box in the row below into a Waterfall Box.
On Open: If adjacent to an open Bedrock Box, win.
On Open: Paint the background a random color.
On Open: You can't open adjacent boxes for 3 opens.
On Open: If no adjacent boxes are revealed, reveal all adjacent boxes.
On Open: If 24 or more boxes are revealed, win.
On Open: Transform 3 random unrevealed boxes into Fish Boxes.
Whenever you reveal a box in this row, open it.
On Open: The next 2 times you click a revealed box, transform it into a random other box.
If you can't open any boxes, you win.
On Open: If 3 or more Fish Boxes are open, win.
On Open: Transform all adjacent boxes into the same random box.
On Click: 20% chance to win. 30% chance to lose.
When you would lose, if this box is open, destroy it instead.
On Open: Paint unrevealed boxes rainbow.
On Click: Close 5 other random boxes. Then destroy this.
If this box is transformed while open, win.
On Open: Reveal the X Box.
On Open: If there's a contiguous line of open boxes to the Treasure Map Box, win.
Whenever you open an unrevealed box, reveal a random box.
When you open a box, stars fly out!
Whenever you destroy a box, it flies away!
On Open: Lose. Then, if you didn't lose, win.
For the next 6 opens, you can only open the highest boxes.
On Open: Destroy the Winner and Loser boxes.
On Open: After you open 9 unrevealed boxes, win.
On Open: Transform a random box above this into an Ivy Box.
Whenever a box is transformed, reveal and close it.
On Click: Spend 2 gold to transform 4 random unrevealed boxes into Winner Boxes.
Whenever a box is destroyed, this gains a use. On Click: Spend a use to reveal a random box.
On Open: Reveal 2 random adjacent boxes.
On Click: If exactly one box in each row is open, win.
On Click: The next time you click a box, swap it with this. Usable 2 times.
On Open: Transform 5 random boxes into Ice Boxes.
On Click: Transform all adjacent boxes randomly. Usable 2 times.
On Click: If the total numbers on boxes is 13 or more, win.
On Open: If 3 or more Spike Boxes are open, lose.
After you open a non-Spike box, transform 2 closed boxes adjacent to the opened box into Spike Boxes.
On Click: Increase the numbers on all numbered boxes by 1, then destroy this.
After you open a box, this gets all letters in its name. If this has the entire alphabet, win.
On Open: Reveal all boxes with duplicates.
After you open a box, destroy a random box adjacent to the opened box.
When you open a box, if the Cloak, Hat, or Wand Boxes are adjacent to it, reveal them.
Equip certain Badges to modify this box's effects!
Whenever you use an On Click, reveal a random box.
On Open: Transform the boxes above this into Demolition Boxes and below this into Tape Boxes.
After opening 3 adjacent boxes, reveal 5 random boxes.
On Click: Destroy the box left of this.
On Click: Destroy this, then transform all revealed boxes randomly.
On Open: Gain 1 Gold for each other open box in this row.
After you open 2 adjacent boxes, lose.
On Open: Transform 5 random boxes into Smart Bomb Boxes.
On Click: If two or more adjacent revealed boxes are the same, win.
On Open: If this box isn't surrounded, lose.
On Open: Reveal the unrevealed box you've opened the least.
For the next 5 seconds, opening boxes reveals a random box.
Chooses a box. See an additional letter every 3 opens. If you open that box, win!
On Open: Transform a random box above this into an Extra Life, Cheap, Change, Gold or Flower box.
On Open: If this is adjacent to 4 or fewer boxes, win.
For the next 5 opens, you must reveal opened boxes first.
On Open: If this is adjacent to an open box, lose.
After you open a box, transform a random box into a Locust Box.
After you open a box, gains a charge. On Click: Destroy this and reveal random boxes equal to its charge.
After you open a box, swaps places with the opened box.
Prevent the next 3 times you'd reveal a box.
On Open: For each adjacent box, transform 4 random boxes into copies of it.
After you open a box, swaps with an adjacent box. If this is destroyed or transformed while open, you lose.
After you open a box, explodes, destroying all boxes within 2 spaces.
On Click: Destroy 7 random boxes. The 7th time you use this, win instead.
On Open: Transform 2 random other revealed boxes into Portal Boxes.
After you open a box, destroy a random adjacent box and swap places with it.
The next time you open an unrevealed box, reveal all boxes adjacent to it.
On Click: 20% chance to win. If you don't win, destroy this. +20% win chance per open Sword, Cannon or Wand.
Looks a different direction each time you open a box. You can't open boxes it's looking at.
Color opened box outlines based on the amount of times you've opened them!
Fires a laser. Click to rotate. (That's not an On Click!)
Reflects lasers. Click to rotate. (That's not an On Click!)
If this is hit by a laser, you win.
After you open a box, destroy the box this is pointing at, then spin.
Displays the number of adjacent boxes with "win" in their text.
Displays the number of adjacent boxes with "lose" in their text.
On Open: If you have no Gold, lose.
After you open a box, rotate all boxes in this row to the right.
On Open: Reveal the Stellar, Music, and Flying boxes.
After you open three boxes in any direction from this, lose.
On Open: Your cursor gains a top hat!
On Open: Reveal a random box with "win" in its text.
On Open: If the top 3 rows are all open, you win.
Start Of Run: Reveal a random box.
After you open 3 boxes, close all boxes.
If you open a box adjacent to the Winner Box, it reveals itself.
Win with the Winner Box 50 times.
Replace the Loser and Jumpscare boxes with Book Boxes.
Lose on the first open 10 times.
Every 6 opens, reveal a random box.
Start Of Run: Transform random boxes into Gamer Boxes equal to your winstreak (max 6).
Start Of Run: Transform 2 random boxes into Fishing Boxes.
If there's 24 or more open Viral Boxes, you win.
Ivy transforms both boxes above it instead of just one.
The DNA Box reactivates its effects every time you open a box until you open an adjacent box.
The Strange Box reveals the Boss Box, and vice versa.
Every 6 opens, close a random box.
Start Of Run: Reveal the top box.
If the Trigaze Box reveals no boxes, win.
Reveal 30 boxes with the Trigaze Box.
After you've destroyed 10 boxes while the Flying Box is open, win.
The first time you open a box each run, transform the boxes left and right of it into copies of it.
Start Of Run: Destroy the Winner and Loser boxes. Replace the Sleepy Box with a Clone Box.
Whenever you open a box, reveal Extra Life, Flower, Cheap, Change, and Golden Boxes above it.
If the Deserted Box is destroyed, transform a random closed box into the Deserted Box.
The Badge Box now reveals all adjacent boxes.
The Badge Box now closes all adjacent boxes.
The Badge Box now transforms 3 random closed boxes into Badge Boxes.
The Transmog and Dice boxes gain double uses.
Whenever you open a Butterfly Box, transform a random box in the row above into a Butterfly Box.
Win with the Butterfly Box 10 times.
When you open the Egg Box, destroy the Dungeon, Heartbreak, Poison and Curse boxes.
Win with the Egg Box 10 times.
Replace the Inversion Box with an Espionage Box.
When 15 boxes are revealed, reveal Pandora's Box.
The Sacrifice Box now has 15 uses.
You can now click the Rowwin Box to win if the row is fully open too.
Win with the Rowwin Box in a row with 10 or more boxes.
If the Crumbling Box destroys itself, you win!
Destroy 250 boxes with the Crumbling Box.
Opening a Fish Box reveals the Waterfall Box.
Win with the Waterfall Box while 10 or more Waterfall Boxes are open.
You can't lose for the first 3 opens.
Fire Boxes can now only transform closed boxes.
Win with the Inferno Box 3 times.
Replace the Clock Box with an Info Box.
